io.sphere.sdk.carts

Interface CartLike<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of this CartLike, order or cart
    All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, Custom, Identifiable<T>, Referenceable<T>, Resource<T>, ResourceIdentifiable<T>, ResourceView<T,T>, Timestamped, Versioned<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cart, Order

    public interface CartLike<T>
extends Resource<T>, Custom
    Interface to collect the common stuff between carts and orders.

    If you want to use this class as abstraction for Cart and Order then use it as CartLike<?>.
